Params: {1: "Mori opens his eyes and, through his fingers, observes this place he doesn't recognize.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 7: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '"Mori, there you are. What\'s that in your hand?" says a familiar voice.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 7: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'In silence, he looks down at the core in hand and says.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 7: '1', 10: '1'}
